EmailTemplate.name: Virtual Survey-Sales Rep
EmailTemplate.subject: Virtual Site Survey For Solar Project
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for opting in to the Virtual Survey for your Customer.
Below is a link to the form. You'll need to allow 5 to 10 minutes to complete this.
Tip: It's best to complete this from your cell phone or tablet device, as you can quickly and easily upload the photos.
Click here to get started! https://palmetto.formstack.com/forms/remote_site_assessment
Once complete, our experienced Design team will review the information, and immediately get started on the custom Design.
If you have any questions or need assistance, please contact us at 843-720-1844.
Palmetto Team
